subject: Re: Hope you are safe from this P
body:
I have waited for your response. Let me know if you got my message. If you
are interested, you try and make time to reply messages on time to enable
us facilitate this great opportunity.

I await your response.

Mr. Collins Alinco

On Monday, February 5, 2024, Jeremy <my02863@***.com> wrote:
>
>
>
> Hello Mr. Nick C. Logan,
>
> Thank you for reaching out to me with this exciting opportunity! I'm
always open to new experiences and projects, especially ones that could
potentially bring a smile to my face.
>
> I'm intrigued by the sound of this project, it seems like a big endeavor.
Could you please provide more details about it? What exactly does it
involve and what kind of assistance do you need from me?
>
> Looking forward to hearing more about this!
>
> Best wishes,
> Jeremy
>
>
>
>
>

subject: Re: Hope you are safe from this P
body:
Please Mr. Jeremy if you are not in for the project, let me know so that I
can get another partner. Keeping silent to me doesn't make any sense to me.
This project is so paramount to me.

On Friday, February 2, 2024, Jeremy <my02863@***.com> wrote:
>
>
>
> Hello Mr. Nick Logan,
>
> I hope you're doing well too in these challenging times. I'm intrigued by
your message and would love to hear more about this important matter that
could benefit us both. Could you please provide more details?
>
> Looking forward to hearing from you soon!
>
> Best wishes,
> Jeremy
>
>
>
>
>
